plugins.name: Dodgeball
plugins.description: The "Dodgeball" game mode
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: All Hands On Deck
plugins.description: The All Hands On Deck game mode
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Last Tank Standing
plugins.description: Game mode where the last tank standing wins the match
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Capture the Base
plugins.description: Prevents players from picking their own team flag up. Also it flag resets (unused) when a flag is captured
plugins.author: flying_popcorn

name: Flags
description: Custom flag or changes how a default flag works

plugins.name: Safe Genocide
plugins.description: A Genocide-like flag without the mass killing
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Extra Point Flags
plugins.description: Kills made with these flags count towards extra points. Includes hundredPoint, triplePoint, and doublePoint
plugins.author: I_Died_Once

plugins.description: Shooting with the Grenade flag generates a delayed detonation in front of you, where the detonation distance is controlled by your tank speed
plugins.author: Pac-Man

plugins.name: Reverse Geno
plugins.description: Allows a player to genocide the other team by being shot
plugins.author: asinck

plugins.name: Useless Mine
plugins.description: Allows players to place mines by grabbing the Useless flag

plugins.name: Risky Geno
plugins.description: A player who dies while holding Genocide will have his whole team obliterated

plugins.description: Causes a player to drop a Genocide flag when they make a kill with it

plugins.description: Makes team flags behave like Genocide flags when held by a member of their respective teams
plugins.author: L4m3r

name: Mechanics
description: Changes how the game's mechanics work

plugins.name: Mapped Death Zones
plugins.description: Introduces basic spawning logic based on where a player died
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Auto Team Balance
plugins.description: Switches players to another team during gameplay without the need for a respawn or rejoin. Also allows for auto team balancing
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: CTF Overseer
plugins.description: Oversees the fairness and features of CTF
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Demilitarized Zones
plugins.description: Adds zones to maps where shots are rendered harmless
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Flag Reset On Cap
plugins.description: Resets all the flags on the map when a flag is captured except for the team flags
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Shot Limit Zone
plugins.description: Allows you add shot limits to flags based on the location where they are picked up
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Spawn At Base
plugins.description: Force players to spawn at a custom base object instead of their respective bases
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Capture Bonus
plugins.description: Awards a static bonus to players who capture the flag
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Checkpoint
plugins.description: Save a player's spawn location when they reach checkpoints
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Bounty Hunter
plugins.description: Rewards those bounty hunters who are always going after the players on a rampage
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Timed Flag On Spawn
plugins.description: Gives player a flag on spawn, but takes it away shortly after

plugins.description: Gives some use to the Useless flag where it will award as many points as your current killing spree

plugins.description: Modifies all spawns to face the dead center of the map (0, 0, z)

plugins.description: Query VPN detection services to auto-kick players on VPNs
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Persistent Mute
plugins.description: Persists mutes after a player rejoins
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Player Join Handler
plugins.description: Help avoid disruptions during matches
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Var Protection
plugins.description: Disallows anyone with the /set permission to change certain variables
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Muted Chat Helper
plugins.description: Allows muted players to send several pre-determined messages
plugins.author: macsforme

plugins.name: Admin Listener
plugins.description: Forwards team chat and private messages between players to observer admins
plugins.author: macsforme

plugins.name: Server Control
plugins.description: Fork of the original serverControl BZFlag plug-in with capabilities to reload more than just ban files
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Relative BZDB Values
plugins.description: A BZFlag plugin to change BZDB settings based on the amount of non-observer players
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Player DB
plugins.description: The playerdb plugin interfaces with a web API to store and query player join information
plugins.author: blast

plugins.description: Restores a player's score whenever they rejoin within a set amount of time

plugins.description: Translation plugin that will convert regular chat to AOL 1337 speak

plugins.description: Allows setting up staged scenes with fixed tanks and shots. Useful for generating screenshots
plugins.author: blast

plugins.name: Map Change
plugins.description: Allows players to change the map
plugins.author: allejo

plugins.name: Geno Stats
plugins.description: Adds a command to the game that allows players to check on some simple statistics for Genocide flag usage
plugins.author: L4m3r
